newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks edge up at close in mixed market.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks edge up at close in mixed market.

text.p: Dhaka stocks recovered from a bearish week and gained marginally after investors started buying again, brokers said.
The Dhaka Stock Exchange (DSE) all share price index closed 25.55 points or 0.77 percent up at 3,323.59. Turnover was 202.6 million taka. Of 116 traded issues, 58 gained and 58 lost.

Share prices fell throughout the last week after investors took to the sideline amid statements by Finance Minister S.A.M.S. Kibria that the market was overheated and deserved regulation. Apex Foods shed 462.43 taka to 17,663.91 and Shine Pukur Holdings rose 35.92 to 754.33. --Dhaka Newsroom 880-2-506363
